title: Old labels typography
content:
Hi all!

Another weekend discovering my country. Here are some typography old labels that I found in a museum of old cars in Caramulo (Portugal).  
Just for fun!  
Enjoy.

António

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/caramulo1_4997.jpg)

 [‹ Different major](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48667 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typeface suggestions for BrandMinute ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48700 "Go to next forum topic")
author: afonseca1974

comments.content:
nice.

I wish there was a resource of old signage from different countries available ... I’d even love to set one up if people’d be interested in submitting pics etc.

I can’t get enough of them.

thanks

—————  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Logo Design Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239/http:/www.solid-creative.com/identity.htm)

Thank you, Antonio! You just made me hate today’s corporate design! ;-)

And Paul, I just have been to NZ’s South Island where I found great handlettered signs. Would these be welcome, too?

António

These are beautiful. Thanks.  
Here are a couple of norwegian examples from my kitchen.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/old1_4728.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/old2_5278.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/old3_5157.jpg)

check these sites out for old skool style -

[http://www.boxofapples.com/menu.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239/http:/www.boxofapples.com/menu.htm "http://www.boxofapples.com/menu.htm")

[http://www.travelbrochuregraphics.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239/http:/www.travelbrochuregraphics.com/ "http://www.travelbrochuregraphics.com/")

Enjoy.

JH

Ok. I am loving these.

I’m going to see if I can’t find some time today to make this happen.

—————  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Design Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122075239/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)
